price: (24) And leave the sea in stillness.[1463] Indeed, they are an army to be drowned."
arabic: وَٱتۡرُكِ ٱلۡبَحۡرَ رَهۡوًاۖ إِنَّهُمۡ جُندٞ مُّغۡرَقُونَ
footnotes: [1463]- After it has parted, in order that the soldiers of Pharaoh would follow the Children of Israel and be drowned.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-ut'ruki al-baḥra rahwan innahum jundun mugh'raqūna
